builderConditions.HCRA_DESCRIPTION:
Our records indicate that you have breached your past terms and conditions of registration by not fulfilling the requirements under the Builder Education Program.  
You have not fulfilled the requirements under the Builder Education Program, which was one of the conditions placed on your registration in the previous years.  You must provide proof of registration within the next THIRTY (30) days for each of the courses listed below:

1) Business Planning and Management 
2) Financial Planning and Management 
3) Project Management and Supervision 
4) Legal Issues in Housing 
5) Construction Technology 
6) Customer Service / Tarion Requirements 

Once you have provided proof of registration within 30 days, you are required to show proof of successful completion of these courses within the next SIX (6) months.  The core competencies must be held by the Registrant (if a sole proprietor or partnership) or by the Directors or Officers (DO) of the Registrant (for corporations) and can be held by one DO or by a team approach with DOs each demonstrating one or more competencies.   
Failure to provide proof of successful completion of ALL courses within the next SIX (6) months will result in the Registrar increasing security requirements, reducing enrolment limits and/or issuing a Notice of Proposal to revoke your registration.
